EmailTemplate.subject: Your current Work Permit or Visa is due to expire on {!TR1__Associated_Qualification__c.Work_Permit_OR_Visa_Expiry_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your current Visa is due to expire {!TR1__Associated_Qualification__c.Work_Permit_OR_Visa_Expiry_Date__c}. Please advise us if you have begun the application process for a new Visa.
We need to sight your new Visa or a confirmation letter from the Home Office to confirm you have a new Visa “in process” before the date shown above otherwise, we will no longer be able to offer you work from the date above and will have to withdraw you from any pre-booked assignments.
The Compliance Team Supply Desk complianceteam@supplydesk.co.uk
